name: Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel
name_original: Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel
description:
Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel is an adventure-simulation game developed by Sierra Entertainment and Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1987. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel is available on Atari ST, Apple II, Commodore / Amiga and Classic Macintosh.
